metadata.title: CVE-2020-11082 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Kaminari before 1.2.1, there is a vulnerability that would allow anattacker to inject arbitrary code into pages with pagination links. Thishas been fixed in 1.2.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11082` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-kaminari - 1.0.1-6
ruby-kaminari-actionview - 1.0.1-6
ruby-kaminari-activerecord - 1.0.1-6
ruby-kaminari-core - 1.0.1-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-kaminari package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-6').
